title: Font on the Virgin Mobile Australia site?
content:
Hello,

I was wondering is anyone could identify this very pretty rounded italic font which is currently being used on Virgin Mobile Australia's website:

[Example 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20130424043156/http:/www.virginmobile.com.au/vma/static/images/home/feature-promo-img-d.jpg)

[Example 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20130424043156/http:/www.virginmobile.com.au/vma/static/images/home/feature-promo-img-a.jpg)

(This is my first post, so I hope I am doing this right!)

Thanks in advance!
author: ohmy

comments.content:
Hi Niqui,

welcome to Typophile!  
Yes, you did everything right, even your thread title is [exemplary](http://web.archive.org/web/20130424043156/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2 "Frequently Asked Question – What do I enter in the “Title” line?")!

The font is [Omnes](http://web.archive.org/web/20130424043156/http:/www.dardenstudio.com/typefaces/omnes) by [Joshua Darden](http://web.archive.org/web/20130424043156/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Joshua%20Darden).  
F

You're not one of The Residents are you?

Nick Cooke
